评论详情: Material is nice and thick. Bought this for my favorite person and it fit him like a glove. Made him look like old money.
My son looked perfect in this white suit tux at our black tie gala!!! He was a show stopper when he walked in!!!! Fit him perfectly just needed a small hem.
Suit fit fairly well and true to size. Pant were a little smaller than expected. Quality was better than expected. I will buy again….
The material is weird and thin. The suit looks decent, but it's very cheaply made. This would be great for teens. Also, the pants and vest fit perfectly but the jacket is too big. I'd size down.

评论详情: First one came in and it was used wreaking of cheap cologne. Sent it back for a replacement. Second suit came in and I gotta say for the price it’s great. Quality of material is nice cut and seams are clean. Looked great on my son and I’ll gladly buy another for his next prom. You really can’t go wrong for the $.
Purchased for my husband,  he tried it in, fits perfect, comfortable a looks very nice. Really good quality material. Very pleased with the purchase

评论概述: Cheap... get what you pay for
评论详情: Was not impressed with the cheap quality. Returned.

评论概述: Good quality for the price. Fits well.
评论详情: I am 5'11" and weigh 155 lb. I ordered the medium size and it fit well. If you are much heavier, then L or even XL would probably be better. Quality overall was good - better than I expected for the price.  Took a while to work out what pockets were tack stitched closed, and what pockets were dummies and weren't really pockets. I removed the white trim from the suit breast pocket so I could insert something matching my tie. My only suggestion would be to clearly mark the tacked pockets, and make the white trim removable.  I would recommend.

评论概述: Looks great, order a size bigger
评论详情: Most local suits are extremely expensive. This is worth it for it's price. The fabric doesn't exactly look or feel cheap. You can really highten its appearance with the right dress shirt and tie. My soon-to-be wife (yes, i'm getting married in this) gave me two thumbs up when i tried it on.  I would have given this review 5 stars, but unfortunately, all the reviews I read about the size chart is absolutely correct. I did as everyone suggested and ordered a larger size; happy to say it fits great. I encourage you to do the same unless you're borderline anorexic.  Keep in mind that these kind of suits will always running snug to give you the slimmest look possible. I'm 6'2"/ 225 lbs, and i ordered a size XXL. If you're anything larger than this or want a less slimming fit, i suggest going for an XXXL.  Hope this helps

I almost pay $150 for a similar suit at a men's store. I took a chance with this and glad I did. To make it easier for others regarding to fit, I wear 48R so I ordered XXXL. Only one thing, the pants thigh area could be a bit more roomie but it's not tight like a skinny fit
Nice looking suit, if you’re a normal size guy. 6’10 and 280 is not a fit.  Looks good on others though. Nice suit other wise.

It came stained with what appears to be a nicotine stain across the sleeve. That is unacceptable for a new suit. I can not give a good review for it at this time. ...... Update: I took this suit to be cleaned and discovered the stains disappeared. I had the suit pressed and returned home with it. I discovered that the lighting where I keep my suits was reflecting on the suit giving the appearance of a stain. Suit fits perfectly and is excellent for the price. A+++++
Se ajustó muy bien

评论概述: Not bad for what it is
评论详情: The sizing is NOT accurate to the chart, definitely more of a slim fit than regular cut. The quality is alright for what it is but I honestly gave this to my son who would not be wearing it as often as I would. If you are looking for a quality suit, this one is not the one. Very basic but if you needed something to look good for a one-time thing, this is alright. Be prepared to send to cleaners to get properly steamed and pressed because this will come folded into a small bag.
I am returning this because it didn't fit me. Also, FYI, the vest was not included. Thank you.
It did not fit well to small someone who takes an extra lrge should look at a 2x or 3x
I tried for a size one up from me to be careful, and it’s too tight. I would go up two sizes if you’re going to buy.

This is a really nice suit.  It'll look good for a wedding.  Only wish we'd gone up a bit in size.  Hubby losing a bit of weight to fit it as it was quite snug when he got it.  It's like the measurements were exact with no wiggle room.  Would buy again though.

It’s a nice looking suit but they are the typical Amazon Chinese small suits. This one is stated as NOT a slim fit in size 52 3XL. I wear a 52 religiously with large shoulders, traps and neck. This suit is easily a size 50 or under. I’m so disappointed because it’s impossible to find a suit on Amazon if you’re big frame guy.  This is the 4th suit this week I’ve tried on Amazon and not one was even close to the advertised size. This one’s going back too. If you’re a small framed skinny guy you’ll find one but if you’re bigger stronger guy you won’t have any luck.
